title: Fireside with the Underboss - "If I Saw Him There I Would Have Killed Him"
description: Sammy gets called to testify as a witness for Fat Sally; a man who wanted to kill him. Although it's a big risk to take, sticking to the truth is the key component in Sammy's testimony.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy gets called to testify as a witness for Fat Sally; a man who wanted to kill him. Although it's a big risk to take, sticking to the truth is the key component in Sammy's testimony.
